Plot: New York Times and USA TODAY bestselling author Brenda Jackson brings you the story of Jason Westmoreland. With one convenient proposal, he could have a Southern beauty in his bed and her birthright in his hands. If only the lovely lady would say yes…. Plus a Brenda Jackson classic—the first in the Steele family series, Solid Soul .
Characters: Kylie Hagan, Chance Steele, Jason Westmoreland, Elizabeth "Bella" Bostwick
